mapper.select: select c.id as cartId, c.product_id, c.quantity, c.size, c.spicy, adddate(curdate(),3) as deliveryDay, p.price, pi.image_url as product_img, p.title from carts as c , products as p,products_images as pi where c.product_id=p.id and p.id=pi.product_id and user_id=#{param} order by c.id desc

select w.id as wishId, w.product_id, p.price, pi.image_url as product_img, p.title, ca.name as subcategory from wishlists as w , products as p, products_images as pi, categories as ca where w.product_id=p.id and p.id=pi.product_id and p.subcategory_id=ca.id and user_id=#{param} order by w.id desc
select count(*) as count from carts where user_id=#{param}
mapper.insert: insert into carts(product_id, user_id, size, spicy, created_at, updated_at) values(#{product_id}, #{user_id}, #{size}, #{spicy}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select count(*) as num, quantity, id from carts where user_id=#{param1} and product_id=#{param2} and size=#{param3} and spicy=#{param4}
select count(*) as num, id from wishlists where product_id=#{param1} and user_id=#{param2}
mapper.update: update carts set quantity=quantity+1, updated_at=now() where id=#{param}
